Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Canopy seal deterioration. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Tail Assembly component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 12/08/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
